description: pylibROM introduces python binder for libROM through pybind11. Through python interface, users who are familiar with python can take advantage of capabilities available in libROM that is fully parallelized C++ library for reduced order modeling. libROM itself is an open source code developed at LLNL. libROM is available at https://github.com/LLNL/libROM .
name: python binder for libROM
